content: HIT-SZ Injection accessories Accessories for injectable mortars, including piston plugs and extension hoses ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Accessories for fasteners > Injectable mortar accessories ### FEATURES:Features Injection pistons and flexible extension hoses help ensure adhesive injection into the drilled hole is consistent and free of air voids Allows more accurate injection of estimated chemical volume, minimizing undue wastage Applications Injecting Hilti HIT anchor chemicals in a variety of conditions including deep holes, overhead holes and underwater ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 2038746 - Piston plug HIT-IP 1/2 for use with HIT-VL 11 - Package Size 10 pc Package Contents: - 1x IP 1/2 NG Piston plug - 2038747 - Piston plug 9/16 for use with HIT-VL 11 - Package Size 10 pc Package Contents: - 1x IP 9/16 NG Piston plug - 2038748 - Piston plug 5/8 for use with HIT-VL 11 - Package Size 10 pc Package Contents: - 1x IP 5/8 NG Piston plug - 2039300 - Piston plug 3/4 for HIT-VL 11 or 16 - Package Size 10 pc Package Contents: - 1x IP 3/4 NG Piston plug - 2039301 - Piston plug 7/8, for HIT-VL 11 or 16 - Package Size 10 pc Package Contents: - 1x IP 7/8 NG Piston plug - 2039302 - Piston plug 1, for HIT-VL 11 or 16 - Package Size 10 pc Package Contents: - 1x IP 1 NG Piston plug - 2039303 - Piston plug 1-1/8, for HIT-VL 11 or 16 - Package Size 10 pc Package Contents: - 1x IP 1 1/8 NG Piston plug - 2039304 - Piston plug 1-1/4, for HIT-VL 11 or 16 - Package Size 10 pc Package Contents: - 1x IP 1 1/4 NG Piston plug - 2039305 - Piston plug 1-3/8, for HIT-VL 11 or 16 - Package Size 10 pc Package Contents: - 1x IP 1 3/8 NG Piston plug - 2039306 - Piston plug 1-1/2, for HIT-VL 11 or 16 - Package Size 10 pc Package Contents: - 1x IP 1 1/2 NG Piston plug - 2039307 - Piston plug 1-3/4, for HIT-VL 11 or 16 - Package Size 10 pc Package Contents: - 1x IP 1 3/4 NG Piston plug
